revised_title: The Impact of Trace Element Deficiencies on Animal and Human Health
tldr: This article discusses the consequences of trace element deficiencies in animals and humans. It highlights the prevalence of iron and iodine deficiencies, as well as the lesser-known deficiencies of manganese and cobalt. The article emphasizes the importance of understanding these deficiencies and their impact on health to develop effective prevention and treatment strategies.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Nutritional Science
